message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can have 40% of the money, but I'll take the rest. It's a generous offer!
I'll give you most of it, but I still want a decent share!
You're getting desperate, so I'll give you 20%
I'll give you most of it, but I'm not going down without a fight!
You're getting close to nothing, so I'll give you a tiny share
I'll give you most of it, but I'm not giving up yet!
You're running out of time, so I'll give you a small share, but I'll take the rest
I'll give you most of it, but I'm not giving up yet!
You're almost out of time, so I'll give you a tiny share, but I'll take almost all
I'll give you almost all of it, but I'll take a tiny bit!
